SCTX:
Begin TestMoveRock

short initialized
float timer
float startingpos
float currentpos
short active


if ( initialized == 0 )
	set startingpos to ( GetPos Z )
	set currentpos to ( GetPos Z )
	set initialized to 1
endif

If (	GetStandingActor == 1 )
	set active to 1
	playsound "Disarm Trap"
endif

If ( Active == 1 )
	if ( startingpos - currentpos < 30 )
		set currentpos to ( currentpos - 3 )
		SetPos Z, CurrentPos
	else
		SetPos Z, CurrentPos
		StopScript TestMoveRock
	endif
endif

End
